name: Tap Tap Froggy!
description:
Welcome to Tap Tap Froggy! Tap Tap Froggy! is an aesthetic clicker/pet sim game where you get to adopt an adorable virtual froggy! You can even upgrade and customize your froggy! The game is set in an adorable world full of color and cuteness!  When we designed this game we tried really hard to create a world of love and happiness where players can get lost and relax. We worked incredibly hard on this game and put so much love and happiness into its creation. This game means the absolute world to us. We really hope it finds a special place in your heart!

-Ku and Bunni <3

- Features: - - Adorable hand drawn art style! - Customize your froggy with over 65 unique hand drawn items! - A really cool ending, which is triggered when you unlock all of the items (this takes about 30 minuets).  - A kawaii and wholesome aesthetic! UwU - Credits: - Programming/Game design: Kububbis Art: Milkiebunni Music: Baredex Guest Artist: Coralteeth

Here's a lil tip! Once you have your froggy, you can press esc to bring up the menu. Then you can go to the settings panel and put the application into fullscreen mode!

If you donate $1.00 or more you'll unlock an exclusive Tap Tap Froggy! phone wallpaper set!
